gen:link.label:label: BV656: The item "Total expenses" reported in S.05.01 - Premiums, claims and expenses by line of business should be equal to the net expenses for all business lines plus other expenses. -->Template 1: S.05.01; Expression: {r1300,c0200}={r0550,c0010}+{r0550,c0020}+{r0550,c0030}+{r0550,c0040}+{r0550,c0050}+{r0550,c0060}+{r0550,c0070}+{r0550,c0080}+{r0550,c0090}+{r0550,c0100}+{r0550,c0110}+{r0550,c0120}+{r0550,c0130}+{r0550,c0140}+{r0550,c0150}+{r0550,c0160}+{r1200,c0200}

BV656: The item "Total expenses" reported in S.05.01 - Premiums, claims and expenses by line of business should be equal to the net expenses for all business lines plus other expenses. -->Template 1: S.05.01; Expression: {r1300,c0200}={r0550,c0010}+{r0550,c0020}+{r0550,c0030}+{r0550,c0040}+{r0550,c0050}+{r0550,c0060}+{r0550,c0070}+{r0550,c0080}+{r0550,c0090}+{r0550,c0100}+{r0550,c0110}+{r0550,c0120}+{r0550,c0130}+{r0550,c0140}+{r0550,c0150}+{r0550,c0160}+{r1200,c0200}
